description: Sequence diagram test fixtures extracted from mermaid.js (MIT licensed)

fixtures.name: simple_message
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?

fixtures.name: dotted_reply
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?
Bob-->Alice: I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: with_note
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?
Note right of Bob: Bob thinks
Bob-->Alice: I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: async_message
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice-xBob:Hello Bob, how are you?

fixtures.name: arrow_types
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Solid arrow
Bob-->>Alice: Dotted arrow
Alice-)Bob: Solid open
Bob--)Alice: Dotted open

fixtures.name: explicit_participants
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
participant Alice
participant Bob
Alice->Bob:Hello

fixtures.name: participant_alias
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
participant A as Alice
participant B as Bob
A->B:Hello Bob, how are you?
B-->A: I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: actors
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
actor A as Alice
actor B as Bob
A->B:Hello Bob, how are you?
B-->A: I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: mixed_actors_participants
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
actor Alice as Alice2
actor Bob
participant John as John2
participant Mandy
Alice->>Bob: Hi Bob
Bob->>Alice: Hi Alice

fixtures.name: dashes_in_names
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
participant Alice-in-Wonderland
participant Bob
Alice-in-Wonderland->Bob:Hello Bob, how are - you?
Bob-->Alice-in-Wonderland:I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: equals_in_names
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
participant Alice=Wonderland
participant Bob
Alice=Wonderland->Bob:Hello Bob, how are - you?
Bob-->Alice=Wonderland:I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: title_with_colon
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
title: Diagram Title
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?

fixtures.name: title_without_colon
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
title Diagram Title
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?

fixtures.name: acc_title_and_descr
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
title: Diagram Title
accTitle: This is the title
accDescr: Accessibility Description
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?

fixtures.name: acc_multiline_descr
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
accTitle: This is the title
accDescr {
Accessibility
Description
}
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?

fixtures.name: autonumber_basic
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
autonumber
Alice->Bob:Hello Bob, how are you?
Bob-->Alice: I am good thanks!

fixtures.name: note_right
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello
Note right of Bob: Bob thinks

fixtures.name: note_left
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello
Note left of Alice: Alice thinks

fixtures.name: note_over_single
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello
Note over Alice: Important note

fixtures.name: note_over_multiple
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob:Hello
Note over Alice,Bob: Shared note

fixtures.name: explicit_activation
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Hello
activate Bob
Bob->>Alice: Hi
deactivate Bob

fixtures.name: shortcut_activation
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>+Bob: Hello
Bob->>-Alice: Hi

fixtures.name: nested_activation
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>+Bob: Hello
Bob->>+Bob: Self call
Bob->>-Bob: Self return
Bob->>-Alice: Hi

fixtures.name: simple_loop
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob: Hello
loop Every minute
    Bob->Alice: Ping
end

fixtures.name: nested_loops
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->Bob: Hello
loop Outer
    loop Inner
        Bob->Alice: Ping
    end
end

fixtures.name: alt_else
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Hello
alt is sick
    Bob->>Alice: Not so good
else is well
    Bob->>Alice: Great!
end

fixtures.name: opt_block
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Hello
opt Extra response
    Bob->>Alice: Thanks for asking
end

fixtures.name: par_block
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
par Alice to Bob
    Alice->>Bob: Hello
and Alice to John
    Alice->>John: Hello
end

fixtures.name: critical_block
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
critical Establish connection
    Alice->>Bob: Connect
option Connection failed
    Alice->>Alice: Log error
end

fixtures.name: break_block
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Hello
break when error
    Bob->>Alice: Error!
end

fixtures.name: rect_highlight
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
rect rgb(200, 220, 255)
    Alice->>Bob: Hello
    Bob->>Alice: Hi
end

fixtures.name: rect_rgba
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
rect rgba(200, 220, 255, 0.5)
    Alice->>Bob: Hello
end

fixtures.name: create_actor
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Hello
create participant Carl
Bob->>Carl: Hi Carl

fixtures.name: destroy_actor
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
Alice->>Bob: Hello
destroy Bob
Alice-xBob: Goodbye

fixtures.name: link_single
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
participant Alice
link Alice: Dashboard @ https://example.com

fixtures.name: links_multiple
properties
full_example
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
autonumber
participant A as Alice
participant B as Bob
A->>B: Hello Bob
activate B
B-->>A: Hi Alice
loop Health check
    B->>B: Check status
end
Note right of B: Bob is thinking
alt is healthy
    B->>A: I'm good
else is sick
    B->>A: Not feeling well
end
deactivate B

fixtures.name: multi_participant
fixtures.input:
sequenceDiagram
participant A as Alice
participant B as Bob
participant C as Carol
participant D as Dave
A->>B: Hello
B->>C: Hi
C->>D: Hey
D-->>A: Hello back
